item.title: Free license for beyond compare MAC/Win/Linux
item.description: Thanks HUQI’s share! check the lic file 'huqi/trial.key' from above link Take MAC for example: download beyond compare package install replace trial.key under /Applications/Beyond\ Compare.app/Contents/Resources/trial.key with above license save trial.key & restart app Usage: install command line tool e.g., $ bcompare new.f90 old.f90 $ bcompare /Folder1/ /Folder2/ install Beyond Compare plugin on sublime text Notes: Refer the comments on huqi’s Githu for more info This license works for 4.
